full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GIS GSUR MCHOD PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI GSUM BGRYA DRUG CU BZLAS NA LHA 'DRI MI RGYAL PO BLON PO BTZUN MO DGE 'DUN THAMS CAD DBANG DU 'DU BAR THE TSOM MED DO, ,ZAS NOR LONGS SPYOD RTA LUG RA GLANG RNGA MONG GA-YON DAG THAMS CAD RANG GI SEMS BZHIN DU BSDUS PAR THE TSOM MED, ,TSE DANG BSOD NAMS SNYAN GRAGS DPAL 'BYOR MTHU STOBS NUS PA 'PHRIN LAS DBANG RLUNG RTA RGYAS PAR MDZAD PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI MANG NGAG BKA' RGYA MA'I NANG NAS LEN PA'O, ,AITHi, ,RGYA RGYA RGYA RGYA, ,)
author_simple: TSE DANG BSOD NAMS SNYAN GRAGS DPAL 'BYOR MTHU STOBS NUS PA 'PHRIN LAS,
